title: Lag Spikes, Ping Jumping
body:
On a Mac, 6.9, having huge ping spikes from my 62-63 to 130, significant package loss, mostly in the past few days.

Also, I used to be able to ping the League servers to check my ping or Traceroute, and this no longer works.

Please help! I have run the NA Server Tracer Test program and everything seems to be timing out as it heads to the Riot servers.

[Link Removed]

A log analysis (logsoflag.com) shows lots of packet loss.

> NA Server Tracer Test

replies.body:
Since I know you mentioned in another thread that you have tried all of the steps in the Connection Issues Guide without success, I strongly recommend that you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  One of our Tech Specialists can investigate further and work with you one-on-one in order to get this issue resolved.  If you do submit a ticket, make sure to include the following info:

1) [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

2) [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
